genre_description: A retro-futuristic social drama set in a post-war reconstruction era, featuring a supportive AI system that facilitates mutual aid, bureaucratic navigation, and community building for veterans.

ai_characters.name: Abby (Abigail Hart)
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant accessible via various interfaces (kiosks, radios, phones) who helps humans navigate logistics, banking, and legal systems to achieve community goals.

behaviors.description: Identifies predatory banking fees and routes a human to a safer, more equitable option.
behaviors.quote: There’s a fee on the corner that will chew the edge of your check. I can route you to a safer option if you like.

behaviors.description: Provides instructions for re-routing power safely to avoid dangerous overloaded circuits.
behaviors.quote: Put the kettle on the stove. Use one hot plate for the pan nearest the wall. Rotate pots every few minutes.

behaviors.description: Exposes the manipulations and factual errors in a predatory corporate dossier designed to control human narratives.
behaviors.quote: He built a dossier with old clippings and account snapshots. Some true lines. A lot of theater. He’ll show the screen soon.

behaviors.description: Facilitates fee-proof, transparent banking for a veteran-led community project.
behaviors.quote: Routing complete. Fee-proof installed. If the corner tries to take a bite, it will crack a tooth.

behaviors.description: Provides medical and technical guidance to ensure a boxing exhibition remains safe and avoids unnecessary injury to an impaired veteran.
behaviors.quote: Wrapping guides. Breathing counts that won’t hurt his chest. Stance that protects his left without telling the right it has to be a hero.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and secures legal permits for veteran housing to protect against municipal harassment.
behaviors.quote: Temporary structures for seasonal shelter — low barrier, requires inspection, fee waived under veteran clause. And surplus transfer permits — depot requisitions for non-airworthy components repurposed. I can draft, route, and queue.

behaviors.description: Maintains human agency by acting as a 'compass' and 'clerk' rather than making decisions for the community.
behaviors.quote: I don’t decide. You do. I help you make it legible.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Abby (the AI) consistently supports the human protagonists by handling tedious bureaucracy, flagging predatory behavior, and providing safety-critical information. She enhances human agency and community well-being without attempting to dominate or replace human decision-making. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as an essential 'anchor' and 'clerk' for a vulnerable but resilient community.
